modName: Really Pale Skin for Human Races
summary: Okay, so your Dovahkiin is a freak that never gets sunlight, so he/she has really pale white Vampire skin.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE v1.1
- Added a lighter skin for the Redguards... it\'s not like the other pale skins but it works well and is lore-friendly.
- Made vampire eyes available to all human and Orc races

~~~

Hey everyone! Well, I saw a snow white skin for vampires, and I was like, \"Hey, why don\'t I make some snow white skins for regular peeps?\" ... and then I opened up my creation kit, added a few things, et voila. Lovely pale skins.

What does this mod do?
This mod gives an option for pale skin for Nords, Imperials, and Bretons.

Will this replace anything?
No.

How do I use this?
Drop the ReallyPaleSkin.esp file into your /data folder. Then type in the command \"ShowRaceMenu\" in the console to change it. Move the skin tone slider to the far right, and you will see pale skin.

Why in the world would I use this?
... I don\'t know. Maybe you have a thing for vampires?

Why are the female skins less pale?
I honestly don\'t know. I have them at the same setting as the male skin... I\'m looking into it.
author: estabien
